title: Polynesian streamer from NZL - New to the streaming - come join me in this adventure :)

embed.description: About Me: Thrill3r (OCE) Real Name: Tehaa or Tee or Teepac (up2u - umadbro) Age: 24 Born: Wellington, New Zealand Ethnic Background: Maori (New Zealand Native), Samoan, German & English Hobbies: My partner in Crime (girl in the pic), Our beautiful kids, Drinking, Music, getting turnt up & of course League Of Legends Occupation: Campervan Sales Specialist - Ex Telstra NBN Internet Specialist Current Location: Brisbane, Australia

body:
Hey guys it's Thrill3r, I have been playing League of Legends for almost 4 years total on shitty internet making Platinum 1 so far with 100+ ping, now that I have Fiber net I can stream every night from 6:00pm On wards for your entertainment!

I will do my best to answer any questions and help you improve as well as myself.

My stream is highlighted by these key focuses:

Giving tips on the small things that really matter when playing!

Explaining the ideas behind the decisions I made.

Good music! A variety of everything, Gangsta, Hip Hop, RnB, Mainstream, Dubstep, EDM/Dance, Old school classics

Anime Video Clips/Dancing playing while waiting in Queue for a game.

A good looking male gamer (kappa) to just stare at lol.

I am all about that Thug Life baby baaaabyyy - 2Pac - Jokes Kappa! I'm Down to earth with a constant smile, always happy to help anyone!! Just ask.

After representing New Zealand in waterpolo, I've travelled around USA, Europe and the Pacific Islands.

When I'm not working (irl) to create the best experience for clients in my job, I enjoy going to music festivals, playing sports, STREAMING (new) and having FUN

replies.body: LIVE NOW BOYS COME JOIN THE MOVEMENT <3
